content:
Does anyone here have access to delete a rust-lang Appveyor project? This would be the lowest of all priorities, but if anyone does it would be helpful.

For rustfmt we switched over to GitHub Actions a long time ago, but I seem to have no rights to the project in Appveyor regardless of having admin access in the rustfmt repo (I wonder if this is because it was created back in the nursery days?)

It was failing enough that I finally turned it off as best I could, but would greatly appreciate any help getting rid of it altogether

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/rust-lang-libs/rustfmt/history
https://github.com/rust-lang/rustfmt/blob/master/appveyor.yml
Yeah, we should be able to make that happen - I think we have the right access. I'll take a look tomorrow.
@Caleb Cartwright I think I disabled appveyor from starting new builds if you delete appveyor.yml

simulacrum said:

Caleb Cartwright I think I disabled appveyor from starting new builds if you delete appveyor.yml

awesome, thanks so much! will check it out later today
that did the trick @simulacrum, thanks again
